summary: The module implements a Qt modal dialog that guides users through detecting and correcting unlinked (missing) entries in the library. It integrates with the missing file registry and offers actions such as relinking, merging duplicate entries, deleting, and refreshing the view, while displaying progress feedback.
business_intent: Enable endâ€‘users to maintain the integrity of their media tagging database by providing an interactive interface for locating and fixing entries that reference absent files, thereby preventing data inconsistencies and improving overall user experience.
